metadata.title: CVE-2020-1755 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Moodle before 3.8.2, 3.7.5, 3.6.9 and 3.5.11, X-Forwarded-For headerscould be used to spoof a user's IP, in order to bypass remote addresschecks.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
